cost.trigger: The user is switched into combat.

actions.description:
Trigger: The user is switched into combat.
Effect: Connection - Haze. The user freely uses Haze. Whenever user uses Haze, they can 2 PP to have either 1) the user and its allies or 2) foes be excluded from Haze's effect.
